Serial correlation is a feature of financial markets, particularly foreign exchange. This serial correlation may be a function of the behavioural decision-making or institutional features.  Your task is to evaluate the relative importance of these two features and to identify some methods that can be used to take advantage of this inefficiency.  Please use the resources below and any other materials to build your case.  The presentation should be approximately 10 minutes with time for questions.
